word: THE EARNEST PRAYERS OF JESUS CONTRAST WITH OUR FEEBLE PRAYERS.\97Of Christ it is said: \93And being in an agony He prayed more earnestly.\94 In what contrast to this intercession by the Majesty of heaven are the feeble, heartless prayers that are offered to God. Many are content with lip service, and but few have a sincere, earnest, affectionate longing after God.\97(Testimonies for the Church, vol. 4, 534.)
